strings.inviteInfiniteUsesWarning: invites with infinite uses can be used abusively
strings.name: Name
strings.modifySettingsDescription: Apply settings from an existing profile, or source them directly from a user.
strings.settingsRestartRequiredDescription: A restart is necessary to apply some settings you changed. Restart now or later?
strings.settingsRefreshPage: Refresh the page in a few seconds
strings.settingsRequiredOrRestartMessage: Note: {*} indicates a required field, {R} indicates changes require a restart.
strings.ombiUserDefaultsDescription: Create an Ombi user and configure it, then select it below. It's settings/permissions will be stored and applied to new Ombi users created by jfa-go
strings.userProfilesDescription: Profiles are applied to users when they create an account. A profile include library access rights and homescreen layout.
strings.addProfileDescription: Create a Jellyfin user and configure it, then select it below. When this profile is applied to an invite, new users will be created with the settings.

variableStrings.settingsRequiredOrRestartMessage: Note: {*} indicates a required field, {R} indicates changes require a restart.
